_comment: English Lang File for Illagers+ Mod
Use this symbol for colored text:(ยง)

#Config
config.illager_tower_freq.name=Illager Tower Frequency
config.illager_tower_freq.comment=The frequency at which the illager tower spawns. The higher the number, the less likely it spawns. (1 in x chances)

config.illager_archer_tower_freq.name=Illager, Archer Tower Frequency
config.illager_archer_tower_freq.comment=The frequency at which the illager archer tower spawns. The higher the number, the less likely it spawns. (1 in x chances)

config.illager_centre_freq.name=Illager Centre Frequency
config.illager_centre_freq.comment=The frequency at which the illager centre spawns. The higher the number, the less likely it spawns. (1 in x chances)

#Config.Gui
gui.config.illagers_plus.title=Illagers+ Configuration
gui.config.category.general.name=General
gui.config.category.general.name.tooltip=General Configuration for Illagers+
gui.config.category.general.title=Illagers+ General Configuration
